localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: CLIP Playground lets you test OpenAI's new model CLIP from your browser. CLIP is a GPT-3 like AI you can use to perform a variety of tasks that pair both images and text.
blogPost.body: CLIP Playground lets you test OpenAI's new model CLIP from your browser. CLIP is a GPT-3 like AI you can use to perform a variety of tasks that pair both images and text.
blogPost.title: CLIP Playground - OpenAI's CLIP model in your browser, like GPT-3 for images
blogPost.author: Javier Fuentes

localize.description: CLIP Playground让你从浏览器中测试OpenAI的新模型CLIP。CLIP是一个类似于GPT-3的AI，你可以用它来执行各种图像和文本配对的任务。
localize.tagline: OpenAI的CLIP模型在你的浏览器中，就像GPT-3的图像一样。

localize.description: CLIP Playground讓你從瀏覽器中測試OpenAI的新模型CLIP。CLIP是一個類似於GPT-3的AI，你可以用它來執行各種圖像和文本配對的任務。
localize.tagline: OpenAI的CLIP模型在你的瀏覽器中，就像GPT-3的圖像一樣。

previous.excerpt: Prime 3.0 is the set of 7 Libraries for Sketch. It helps design UI much faster thanks to over 2,000 Components and 140 UI Templates (Web + Mobile) connected with 600+ Styles and Color Variables. Configure Prime within minutes and use Components within seconds.
previous.title: Prime Design Starter Kit 3.0 - Set of 7 UI kits to kick-off your project

localize.description: Prime 3.0是一套用于Sketch的7个库。它拥有超过2000个组件和140个UI模板（Web + Mobile），以及600多个样式和颜色变量，可以帮助你更快地设计UI。在几分钟内配置Prime，在几秒钟内使用组件。
localize.tagline: 一套7个UI套件来启动你的项目。

localize.description: Prime 3.0是一套用於Sketch的7個庫。它擁有超過2000個組件和140個UI模板（Web + Mobile），以及600多個樣式和顏色變量，可以幫助你更快地設計UI。在幾分鐘內配置Prime，在幾秒鐘內使用組件。
localize.tagline: 一套7個UI套件來啓動你的項目。
